TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyTabAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 标识要为指定的类显示的属性选项卡。

span.span: Identifies the property tab or tabs to display for the specified class or classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许您向控件添加新的属性页 。The lets you add a new property page to a control. 除了 组件的默认属性集外，还可以添加其他属性选项卡来公开属性信息。The can add additional property tabs to expose property information other than a component's default set of properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 指定属性选项卡。此代码示例定义了一个组件，该组件通过类型公开另一个选定组件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the to specify a property tab. The code example defines a component that exposes the properties of another selected component by type. [!code-cpp[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个无参数的构造函数，用于创建未初始化的 。This is a parameterless constructor that creates an uninitialized . 此构造函数可用于从此属性派生，并通过调用指定多个选项卡类型 。This constructor can be used to derive from this attribute and specify multiple tab types by calling .
